mapper.select: SELECT ID,VALUE1,VALUE2 FROM GOV_TABLE WHERE VALUE3 = #{value3} AND ISDELETED = 0
SELECT VALUE1,VALUE2 FROM GOV_TABLE_FIELD WHERE VALUE3 = #{value3} AND ISDELETED = 0
SELECT t2.company_name Value1, t1.Value2 FROM ( SELECT VALUE3, WM_CONCAT (ID) VALUE2 FROM GOV_APPLICATION_SYSTEM WHERE ISDELETED = 0 GROUP BY VALUE3 ) t1, GOV_COMPANY t2 WHERE t2. ID = t1.value3
SELECT ID,VALUE1,Value2,VALUE7 FROM GOV_APPLICATION_SYSTEM WHERE ISDELETED = 0 AND ID IN #{value3}
